name: @kuroi/numeric
description: Utitilies for C#-like numeric typing in TypeScript

scripts.build: shx rm -rf lib && tsc && npm run copyTypes && npm run copyPackageJSON
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish lib --access=public --scope=@kuroi
scripts.test:deploy: npm run build && npm publish lib --access=public --scope=@kuroi --dry-run

author: kuro <kuro@kuroi.io>
